articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Putin bats for India, Brazil, South Africa's membership at UN Security Council - India Today
articles.description: Noting that, under the leadership of PM Modi, India was becoming more powerful, Russian President Vladimir Putin said India should be represented at the UN Security Council (UNSC). He also backed South Africa and Brazil to get permanent UNSC membership.
articles.content:
India, Brazil and South Africa should be represented at the UN Security Council and their weight in making key international decisions should increase, Russian President Vladimir Putin has said.
